testcase.classname: This contains multiple features of the dashboard
testcase.name: Add KPI to the Business metric
testcase.system-out: Given user is in login page.................................................passed When user enters the credential for tester..................................passed Then user should be able to login...........................................passed When user edits the dashboard...............................................passed And add the kpi as "Gross profit"...........................................passed And add the time period as "Year to date"...................................passed And add the comparision period as "vs. 3 months ago"........................passed And click on save...........................................................passed
